医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Revvity Signals Software 推出 Signals Clinical 解决方案，以加速关键临床试验洞察和数据驱动决策今天，Revvity, Inc. 宣布其软件和信息学部门 Revvity Signals 推出 Signals Clinical™ 解决方案，这是一个软件即服务 (SaaS) 的端到端临床数据科学平台，旨在集中所有数据临床试验数据，提供快速、可行的见解，以加快临床决策并加速治疗药物的市场交付。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Revity-Signals-Software-unveils-signals-clinical-solution-to-accelerate-ritic-clinical-trial-insights-and-data-driven-decisions。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Revity-Signals-Software-unveils-signals-clinical-solution-to-accelerate-ritic-clinical-trial-insights-and-data-driven-decisions。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c016255-e3b8-4b94-8766-3b9d511df413 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 00:19:00 -0500 Revvity Signals Software unveils Signals Clinical solution to accelerate critical clinical trial insights and data-driven decisions
情人节好消息：黑巧克力和香槟可以改善心脏健康这是您在情人节会喜欢的消息：一位领先的健康专家表示，您为爱人购买的黑巧克力和起泡酒也可能改善他们的心脏健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Good-news-for-Valentinee28099s-Day-Dark-chocolate-and-champagne-may-improve-heart-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Good-news-for-Valentinee28099s-Day-Dark-chocolate-and-champagne-may-improve-heart-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ec4dbac-6850-4863-89ee-786d002b0ca0 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 23:59:00 -0500 Good news for Valentine’s Day: Dark chocolate and champagne may improve heart health
新型人工智能驱动的蛋白质图谱工具优化癌症治疗科学家们开发了一种新的人工智能工具，可以绘制癌性肿瘤中蛋白质的功能图谱，使临床医生能够更精确地决定如何进行针对性治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/New-AI-powered- Protein-mapping-tool-optimizes-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/New-AI-powered- Protein-mapping-tool-optimizes-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40949cde-7ee0-41bd-becd-46c1f7efef71 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 23:55:00 -0500 New AI-powered protein mapping tool optimizes cancer therapy
调查显示，英国患者希望更好地获得早期、准确的诊断测试根据患者协会的最新调查数据，英国患者希望更好地早期、准确地诊断健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/UK-病人-want-better-access-to-early-and-accurate-diagnostic-tests-survey-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/UK-病人-want-better-access-to-early-and-accurate-diagnostic-tests-survey-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f81639b-3189-4031-a5b3-b9c32f4c2162 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 23:49:00 -0500 UK patients want better access to early and accurate diagnostic tests, survey shows
药剂师与医生和患者一起减少医院中与用药相关的错误药剂师将与患者和医生合作开展一个新的国家项目，以减少患者住院期间经常发生的用药错误。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Pharmacists-join-doctors-and-病人-to-slash-medication-lated-errors-in-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Pharmacists-join-doctors-and-病人-to-slash-medication-lated-errors-in-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec0771c2-1a19-4bca-9ae0-0d332787099d Tue, 13 Feb 2024 23:46:00 -0500 Pharmacists join doctors and patients to slash medication-related errors in hospitals
研究发现弹性素食饮食可降低心血管风险研究比较了弹性素食者、纯素食者和杂食者的心血管危险因素，发现植物性饮食可能带来显着的健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Flexarian-diet-linked-to-lower-cardioangiography-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Flexarian-diet-linked-to-lower-cardioangiography-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3b88667-df01-4bd8-ac6f-96fac96857e9 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 22:57:00 -0500 Flexitarian diet linked to lower cardiovascular risk, study finds
新指南旨在改善隐球菌病的诊断和治疗由科隆大学 Oliver A. Cornely 教授领导的国际真菌学专家小组联合起草了隐球菌病诊断和治疗指南，旨在改善感染管理，从而提高患者的生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/New-guideline-aims-to-improve-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-cryptococccosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/New-guideline-aims-to-improve-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-cryptococcosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50cff939-7c14-47c0-bf43-b40d804aba7a Tue, 13 Feb 2024 22:21:14 -0500 New guideline aims to improve diagnosis and treatment of cryptococcosis
气味可以帮助抑郁症患者回忆起快乐的回忆匹兹堡大学医学院研究人员和 UPMC 社会工作者在今天发表在《JAMA Network Open》上的一项研究中发现，闻到熟悉的气味可以帮助抑郁症患者回忆起特定的自传体记忆，并可能有助于他们的康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Scents-help-depressed-individuals-recall-happy-memories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Scents-help-depressed-individuals-recall-happy-memories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3811216-e296-4ccd-8577-7c3b13a6b54a Tue, 13 Feb 2024 22:14:22 -0500 Scents help depressed individuals recall happy memories
黑孜然：具有现代健康益处的古老替代种子该评论讨论了黑种草在治疗心脏代谢疾病中的多方面作用，强调了其生物活性成分，如百里醌，这有助于其抗氧化、抗炎和抗血脂异常特性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Black-cumin-Ancient-superseed-with-modern-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Black-cumin-Ancient-superseed-with-modern-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2ba6bc7-2767-4666-b0d8-7bb84d3df4ad Tue, 13 Feb 2024 21:58:00 -0500 Black cumin: Ancient superseed with modern health benefits
镁在延缓衰老方面发挥着关键作用综述强调了镁在减轻衰老标志方面的关键作用，包括端粒磨损、基因组不稳定性、表观遗传改变、蛋白质稳态丧失、线粒体功能障碍、细胞衰老和干细胞衰竭，表明维持足够的镁水平可以支持健康衰老。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Magnesiums-pivotal-role-in-slowing-agings-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Magnesiums-pivotal-role-in-slowing-agings-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1a5652d-62f5-4d2c-a2bb-7c8d3a60c30d Tue, 13 Feb 2024 21:45:00 -0500 Magnesium's pivotal role in slowing aging's impact
